hero.title: Manage your finances intelligently

financialControl.title: Financial Control

user2.quote: The interface is intuitive and the reports are very useful. I recommend it for anyone who wants to have more control over their finances.

cta.title: Start saving today

contact.title: Contact

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Save Money is an innovative platform that aims to simplify personal and business financial management, offering intuitive tools for expense control, investments, and financial planning.

financialControl.title: Financial Control
financialControl.description: Efficiently manage your income and expenses with automatic categorization and detailed reports.

investments.title: Investments
investments.description: Track your investments and receive personalized recommendations based on your risk profile.

currencyConverter.title: Currency Converter
currencyConverter.description: Convert values between different currencies in real-time with automatically updated rates.

teamContact.title: Team Contact
teamContact.description: Contact our support team for questions or to report issues.

personalAccount.title: Personal Account
personalAccount.description: Manage your personal finances with specific tools for budget control and financial goals.

businessAccount.title: Business Account
businessAccount.description: Complete solutions for business financial management, including cash flow and management reports.

multipleLanguages.title: Multiple Languages
multipleLanguages.description: Interface available in multiple languages to serve users from different countries.

multipleCurrencies.title: Multiple Currencies
multipleCurrencies.description: Support for various currencies to facilitate international transactions.

cryptocurrencies.title: Cryptocurrencies
cryptocurrencies.description: Track and manage your cryptocurrency investments with real-time updates.

team.title: Our Team
team.description1: Save Money is developed by a dedicated team of students from the Analysis and Systems Development - Distance Learning course at PUC Minas.
team.description2: Our team combines technical expertise with a passion for innovation to create a complete and accessible financial solution.

puc.title: PUC Minas
puc.description:
The Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais (PUC Minas) is a national and international reference in higher education, standing out for academic excellence, integral formation, and strong performance in research and social responsibility.

The Save Money project was born from this innovative environment, being developed by students from the Analysis and Systems Development - Distance Learning course, with the objective of offering a technological solution for financial management.

The project's realization was made possible by the essential support of PUC Minas' teaching staff, who guided and encouraged the students throughout the development process.

walmor.name: Dom Walmor Oliveira de Azevedo
walmor.description: Born in Côcos (Bahia), the Grand Chancellor of PUC Minas and Metropolitan Archbishop of Belo Horizonte, Dom Walmor Oliveira de Azevedo, is also president of the National Conference of Brazilian Bishops (CNBB). He holds a doctorate in Biblical Theology from the Pontifical Gregorian University (Rome, Italy) and a master's degree in Biblical Sciences from the Pontifical Biblical Institute (Rome, Italy).

luis.name: Professor Dr. Pe. Luís Henrique Eloy e Silva
luis.description: Doctor and master in Biblical Science from the Pontifical Biblical Institute of Rome and graduated in Theology from the Pontifical Catholic University of Rio de Janeiro. He completed a post-doctoral internship at the Faculty of Theology of the Ludwig-Maximilians University of Munich, Germany.

joyce.name: Joyce Christina de Paiva Carvalho
joyce.description: Professor at PUC Minas and coordinator of the CST in Systems Analysis and Development - Distance Learning. She has extensive experience in Information Technology and is an Assistant Professor IV at the Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais. Her areas of interest include databases, BI, Analytics, and Graphs, with a focus on Software Engineering.

humberto.name: Humberto Azevedo Nigri do Carmo
humberto.description: Professor with 17 years of teaching experience and 37 years in systems and software development, having taught at institutions such as CEFET-MG, PUC-MG, Newton Paiva, and UNA. His specialties include Programming Languages, Information Systems, Software Engineering, and Engineering. He also participates in disciplines such as Computer Architecture.

aline.name: Aline Luciane Candido
aline.description: Academic assistant, supporting students and processes of the ADS EaD course at PUC Minas.

ana.name: Ana Flávia Patricio de Barros
ana.description: Works in academic support and student service for the ADS EaD course.

camila.name: Camila Cristina Gonçalves Marques De Moura
camila.description: Responsible for administrative and academic support of the ADS EaD course.

gabriela.name: Gabriela Araújo Batista
gabriela.description: Assists students and professors in the academic routines of the ADS EaD course.

vanilda.name: Vanilda da Conceição De Oliveira
vanilda.description: Supports academic management and student service for the ADS EaD course.

lucila.description: PhD in Computer Science from UFMG, works at PUC Minas in the postgraduate courses in computer science and computing courses, her research interests include education, user-centered design, and serious games.

maria.name: Maria Augusta Vieira Nelson
maria.description: PhD in Computer Science from the University of Waterloo, professor and coordinator of Software Engineering at PUC Minas, with experience in teaching, research, and specializations in the area.

jane.name: Jane Carmelita das Dores Garandy de Arruda Barroso
jane.description: Master in Mathematics Education, teaches Calculus for IT and Engineering at PUC Minas, also working in evaluation and university extension projects.

zulka.name: Zulka Iale Moreira Ferreira
zulka.description: Involved in legal processes, mainly in the state of Minas Gerais. Involvement with Banco Santander S.A.

livia.name: Lívia Borges Pádua
livia.description: Master's degree in Communication from PUC Minas (2009) and is associated with the Faculty of Communication and Arts (FCA).

rodrigo.name: Rodrigo Richard Gomes
rodrigo.description: PhD in Bioinformatics from UFMG, coordinates the Information Systems course and specializations in Data Science at PUC Minas, with experience in IT and music.

rommel.name: Rommel Vieira Carneiro
rommel.description: Master in Informatics from PUC Minas, works as coordinator and professor in Computing courses, with experience in project management and software development.

bernardo.name: Bernardo Jeunon de Alencar
bernardo.description: PhD in Spatial Information Processing, professor and coordinator of Information Systems at PUC Minas, with experience in Electrical Engineering, Computing, and Geoprocessing.

silvio.name: Silvio Jamil Ferzoli Guimarães
silvio.description: PhD in Computer Science from UFMG, professor and researcher at PUC Minas, focusing on image processing, video, and information retrieval.

henrique.name: Henrique Maia Veloso
henrique.description: PhD in Administration from USP, professor and consultant, with experience in management, research, and higher education, working on topics such as occupational stress and identity.

raquel.name: Raquel Alves Furtado
raquel.description: PhD and Master in Administration, with an MBA in HR and a bachelor's in Social Communication. Professor at PUC Minas since 2002, working in Human Resources, Communication, Marketing, and Entrepreneurship. Manager of the PUC Carreiras project, certified coach, and researcher, with over 30 years of experience as a manager, consultant, and author of scientific articles.

lgpd.title: Data Protection Information:
lgpd.message: According to Brazil's General Data Protection Law (LGPD) and the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to request the deletion of your personal data. By confirming this action, you will be exercising this right and all your data will be permanently removed from our systems.
